name: PALAGO BOUTIQUE HOTEL
address: 10 Phố Bát Đàn, Quận Hoàn Kiếm, Hà Nội, Việt Nam
description:
PALAGO BOUTIQUE HOTEL có khu vườn, sân hiên, nhà hàng và quầy bar ở Hà Nội. Khách sạn 4 sao này có bàn bán tour. Chỗ nghỉ cung cấp lễ tân 24/24, dịch vụ đưa đón sân bay, dịch vụ phòng và Wi-Fi miễn phí ở toàn bộ chỗ nghỉ.

Khách sạn sẽ cung cấp cho khách các phòng được trang bị điều hòa có bàn làm việc, ấm đun nước, tủ lạnh, minibar, két an toàn, TV màn hình phẳng và phòng tắm riêng với bồn tắm. Tại PALAGO BOUTIQUE HOTEL, phòng nào cũng có ga trải giường và khăn tắm.

Các điểm tham quan nổi tiếng gần chỗ nghỉ bao gồm Ô Quan Chưởng, Nhà thờ Thánh Joseph và Nhà hát múa rối Thăng Long. Sân bay gần nhất là Sân bay Quốc tế Nội Bài, cách PALAGO BOUTIQUE HOTEL 24 km.

review.rating: Đã đặt phòng đúng hôm khai trương khách sạn. Xứng đáng 10 điểm
review.room_type: Phòng Tiêu Chuẩn Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive: Phòng đúng như đã đặt, nhân viên trẻ nhiệt tình và thân thiện. Buffet sáng rất ngon

review.rating: Xuất sắc
review.comment_positive: Tôi quay lại lần thứ 2 và thấy tất cả vẫn tuyệt vời. Cám ơn khách sạn đã vẫn duy trì chất lượng ở đẳng cấp cao nhất trong tầm giá

review.rating: Great location with comfy quiet room.
review.comment_positive: Comfortable quiet room, great friendly and helpful staff, perfect locations
review.comment_negative: Small room didn’t have a bedside table on both sides of bed

review.rating: Excellent and will return for my next trip to Hanoi
review.comment_positive: Great location - everything is within 10 minutes walk. Clean and friendly staff.
review.comment_negative: A little noisy as it is an old building but nothing too much to worry about.

review.rating: Very nice hotel, with a central location in the old quarter.
review.comment_positive:
Breakfast was good, and varied.
The suite was really nice, a very good bed, and the room was well isolated against street noise.
Central location in the old quarter

review.rating: Stayed for a night. Very clean washrooms
review.room_type: Phòng Tiêu Chuẩn Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive: The room, the location

review.rating: Lovely hotel! Would recommend.
review.comment_positive: Beautiful hotel with nice rooms! Very kind staff.
review.comment_negative: Just FYI — the room key needs to be in the slot in the room for any power to work — our phones didn’t charge overnight the first two nights because we didn’t realize this.

review.rating: The staff went above and beyond to exceed my expectations.  Very clean and great attention to detail
review.comment_positive: Very modern and clean

review.rating: Great location, brilliant and helpful staff and clean spacious rooms
review.room_type: Phòng Tiêu Chuẩn Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive: Firstly the staff, particularly Wendy - are incredible! Wendy went out of her way to help us organise a car for a trip we wanted to do without a tour company. We were also able to check in early which was great. The hotel is spotless, incredibly clean. The room we got was big, and very soundproofed despite being in the busy centre and great blackout curtains - we slept so well. Also the best air con we’ve had in our trip so far. Location is perfect to explore Hanoi.
review.comment_negative: Nothing!

review.rating: Rất tốt
review.comment_positive: The best location for enjoying Hanoi!
review.comment_negative: Pillow too big, too stiff
